mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, B.ID AS BOARD_ID, B.NAME AS BOARD_NAME, A.WRITER_ID, A.WRITER_NAME, A.WROTE_ON, A.UPDATED_ON, A.CHOOSED_ON, A.TITLE, A.BODY, A.HIT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_scrap S WHERE A.ID = S.ARTICLE_ID) AS SCRAP_COUNT, IF(A.WRITER_ID=#{myId}, 'TRUE','FALSE') AS WROTE_BY_ME, (SELECT COUNT(*)>0 FROM article_scrap S WHERE A.ID=S.ARTICLE_ID AND S.SCRAPPER_ID=#{myId}) as SCRAPPED_BY_ME, IF(A.STATUS='BLOCKED', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS BLOCKED, IF(A.STATUS='DELETED', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS DELETED, IF(A.STATUS='DELETED_FORCE', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS DELETED_FORCE, IF(A.CHOOSED_ON IS NOT NULL, 'TRUE','FALSE') AS CHOOSED, A.STATUS FROM article A INNER JOIN board B ON B.ID = A.BOARD_ID WHERE A.ID=#{id} AND A.STATUS!='DELETED'

SELECT A.ID, B.ID AS BOARD_ID, B.NAME AS BOARD_NAME, A.WRITER_ID, A.WRITER_NAME, A.WROTE_ON, A.TITLE, SUBSTRING(A.BODY,1,100) AS BODY_REDUCED, A.HIT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_scrap S WHERE A.ID = S.ARTICLE_ID) AS SCRAP_COUNT, IF(A.STATUS='BLOCKED', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS BLOCKED, IF(A.STATUS='DELETED', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS DELETED, IF(A.STATUS='DELETED_FORCE', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS DELETED_FORCE, IF(A.CHOOSED_ON IS NOT NULL, 'TRUE','FALSE') AS CHOOSED, A.STATUS FROM article A INNER JOIN board B ON B.ID = A.BOARD_ID
A.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND
A.WRITER_ID = #{writerId} AND
A.STATUS!='DELETED' AND
A.CHOOSED_ON IS NOT NULL AND
(LOWER(A.TITLE) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{search}),'%') OR LOWER(A.BODY) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{search}),'%')) AND
ORDER BY
A.WROTE_ON ${order} A.CHOOSED_ON ${order} A.HIT_COUNT ${order} SCRAP_COUNT ${order}
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT A.ID, B.ID AS BOARD_ID, B.NAME AS BOARD_NAME, A.WRITER_ID, A.WRITER_NAME, A.WROTE_ON, A.TITLE, SUBSTRING(A.BODY,1,100) AS BODY_REDUCED, A.HIT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article_scrap S WHERE A.ID = S.ARTICLE_ID) AS SCRAP_COUNT, IF(A.STATUS='BLOCKED', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS BLOCKED, IF(A.STATUS='DELETED', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS DELETED, IF(A.STATUS='DELETED_FORCE', 'TRUE','FALSE') AS DELETED_FORCE, IF(A.CHOOSED_ON IS NOT NULL, 'TRUE','FALSE') AS CHOOSED, A.STATUS FROM ( SELECT * FROM article_scrap S WHERE S.SCRAPPER_ID=#{scrapperId} ) X INNER JOIN article A ON A.ID=X.ARTICLE_ID INNER JOIN board B ON B.ID = A.BOARD_ID
ORDER BY SCRAPPED_ON DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
